forest-g3.title: Forest Clearing
text: A quiet forest clearing filled with drifting silver fog.
A small pond reflects the faint sky between branches.
A lone rock sits half-buried in moss.

textByRace.goblin: Goblins see rocks as tools, food, or friends depending on the mood.
textByRace.elf: Elves see the shape of old runes worn away by time.
textByRace.human: Humans see a rock. Justâ€¦ a rock.

pond.text: A still pond with a single fish that seems to be laughing at you.
